faqs.q: Who can apply for an E-rickshaw loan?
faqs.a: Anyone with min. Age of 18 years and max. 60 years can apply for e-rickshaw loan.

faqs.q: What is the maximum loan amount I can get?

faqs.a: Tenure will be up to 24 months depending upon the model of the e-rickshaw.

faqs.q: Are there any down payment requirements?
faqs.a: Yes, downpayment is required. 30% to 35% of the value of vehicle.

faqs.q: How do I apply for an E-rickshaw loan?
faqs.a: 1. Visit nearest branch or dealer point. 2. Apply online: Fill contact details -> Get call back -> Document verification.

faqs.q: How long does it take to get approved?
faqs.a: It takes 2-3 days for the whole process.

faqs.q: Can I change my EMI date?
faqs.a: No. EMI dates are fixed (1st, 5th, and 11th). You cannot change it after disbursement.
CIBIL Above 650, Owned house proof, No excessive debt, Good repayment habit.

faqs.q: Can I get a loan if I have a low credit score?
faqs.a: Generally no, but we can consider cases with genuine reasons after senior authority approval.

faqs.q: Do E-rickshaw loans come with additional benefits?
faqs.a: Yes, we provide Loan Suraksha and Hospi Care (2 persons) for 1 year.

faqs.q: Can I use the loan for a USED E-rickshaw?
faqs.a: Yes, it can be used for used e-rickshaw loans.
Yes, customers can prepay the E-rickshaw loan.

faqs.q: What happens if I miss a repayment?
faqs.a: Bouncing charges are applicable if you miss a repayment.

faqs.q: Can I restructure my loan if I face difficulties?
faqs.a: Yes, the loan can be restructured as per convenience after settling the running loan with approval.
